item.title: CVE-2023-47837|2024-06-04T10:10:14.075Z -- repute%20infosystems -- armember
item.description: Improper Privilege Management vulnerability in Repute Infosystems ARMember allows Privilege Escalation.This issue affects ARMember: from n/a through 4.0.10.
